awd_titl_txt: Theoretical Studies in Elementary Particle Physics
awd_abstract_narration: Research in theoretical elementary particle physics will                   focus on several issues within the framework of the standard                    gauge theory of particle interactions.  The problem of the                      strange quark and gluon contents of the nucleon will be                         studied.  In particular, the physical origin and phenomeno-                     logical consequences of 'anomalies' (the quantum violation of                   classical conservation laws) which are related to these                         contents will be examined.                                                           This work has wide implications for our understanding of                   the theory of the strong interactions, quantum chromodynamics,                  and for our understanding of the nucleon.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
